thread.section_title: The Nadler Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean, friendly, charming neighbourhood
thread.title_full: Clean, friendly, charming neighbourhood - Review of The Nadler Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kristen M
title: Clean, friendly, charming neighbourhood
text: The Nadler is situated in a quiet and charming location very close to the Earl's Court underground station which makes getting around easy. It is a little out of the Central area of London so it depends on where you are wanting to see but I was able to get to most places easily using the underground. The room was clean and had good facilities including wifi, iron, kitchenette. The staff were very friendly and helpful. I would stay here again.
